Name: Aqua Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Electric-type moves from damaging Water-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Water-type Pokémon.  You can get an Aqua Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Blue Silk, a Water Dust, and an Aqua Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
